      double[] MyCoords.azimuth_elevation_dist(Point3D gps0, Point3D gps1)
      computes the polar representation of the 3D vector be gps0 to gps1 Note: this method should return an azimuth (aka yaw), elevation (pitch), and distance some info about this: http://tchester.org/sgm/analysis/peaks/how_to_get_view_params.html?fbclid=IwAR3y8HcMQrCSTy5AWa3--_PzH-Fw6wYkLQoYdz5ERDhLaKa63yCMRNMgVt4.

      computes the polar representation of the 3D vector be gps0-->gps1 Note: this method should return an azimuth (aka yaw), elevation (pitch), and distance
